cards.detail: A side effect can be any undesirable outcome that results from blood pressure management. You recently had a condition that may be a side effect. If you are currently experiencing ongoing symptoms, we strongly recommend reaching out to your primary care provider.|[{ "id": "contact-suggestion", "label": "Contact care team", "type": "suggestion-link", "actions": [{"label":"Contact your care team if you are currently experiencing a side effect" , "url":"/contact?token=untreated-adverse-event"}] },{"id": "adverseevent-AE-TreatedAndUntreated-2", "type": "adverse-event", "label": "Brief loss of consciousness"}]|at-most-one|

cards.summary: See care team and discuss treatment if event recurs
cards.detail: A side effect associated with blood pressure management has been detected and addressed: Acute kidney problem. If event recurs, adjustment to medication and/or blood pressure goal may be required.|[]|at-most-one|
